titles: Proclamation for a solemn national fast.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,
notes: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the second day of August, and of Our Reign the twelfth year, 1700.
